sentences.en: After has been done the school assignment, she begins to see television.
sentences.cn: 做完作业后, 她开始看电视.

sentences.en: Fast as you do, you can't finish the assignment in two hours.
sentences.cn: 尽管你做得快, 总也不能在两小时内将功课做完.

sentences.en: He became a general - assignment anchor at CNN Headline News in July.
sentences.cn: 他从7月份开始担任有线新闻电视公司(CNN)(标题新闻)栏目的总编排.

sentences.en: He has got a new assignment.
He is a yellow - bellied guy; don't send him on such a tough assignment!
sentences.cn: 他是个胆小的, 不要给他这么艰难的工作.

sentences.en: He is responsible for the assignment of jobs.
He left for his assignment in the Middle East.
He would symbolize the importance we attached to the assignment.
sentences.cn: 他将体现我们对这个职务所寄予的重要性.

sentences.en: His assignment was to follow the spy.
sentences.cn: 分配给他的工作是跟踪这个间谍.

sentences.en: I hate to interrupt your intimate conversation but we do have an assignment to discuss.
sentences.cn: 我实在不愿打断你们的私人谈话，但是我们确实有事要谈。

sentences.en: I think if I get half of the assignment done by tomorrow, I am ahead of the game.
sentences.cn: 我想如果在明天之前我能获得一半的签名, 我将处于有利的地位.

sentences.en: Ordinarily I fly to an assignment like this and rent a car.
sentences.cn: 平常在这种情况下我都乘飞机去,在当地租一辆车.

sentences.en: Please turn in your assignment before you leave the classroom.
sentences.cn: 离开教室以前,请把作业交上来.

sentences.en: She’s gone to Italy on a special assignment.
sentences.cn: 她去意大利执行一项特殊任务。

sentences.en: The assessment for the course involves written assignments and practical tests.
sentences.cn: 这门课程的评估包括各种书面作业和实践测试。

sentences.en: What is today's assignment in history?
sentences.cn: 今天历史课指定的作业是什么?

words.tran_cn: [经] 可分配的；可指定的；可让渡的
分配；约会；指定；[经] 转让
代理人；受托人；分配到任务的人
将财产过户（尤指过户给债权人）
分配；指派；[计][数] 赋值

phrases.tran_cn: 转让方法；指定分配方法
指派问题；分配问题；分派问题；配置问题
信道分配；通道分配；信道指配

trans.tran_en: a piece of work that is given to someone as part of their job
